price: Nnipa no bi wͻ agyidiefoͻ no mu a wͻdi nokorε wͻ apam a wͻ ne Nyankopͻn apam no ho. Ebinom nso wͻ hͻ a wͻadi wͻn bͻhyε no so (awu sε mogya ho adansefoͻ), na ebi nom nso wͻ hͻ a wͻretwεn, na wͻnsesaa (wͻn adwen wͻ bͻhyε) no ho koraa.
arabic: مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رِجَالٞ صَدَقُواْ مَا عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ عَلَيۡهِۖ فَمِنۡهُم مَّن قَضَىٰ نَحۡبَهُۥ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنتَظِرُۖ وَمَا بَدَّلُواْ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mina al-mu'minīna rijālun ṣadaqū mā ʿāhadū al-laha ʿalayhi famin'hum man qaḍā naḥbahu wamin'hum man yantaẓiru wamā baddalū tabdīlan
